thread.title: Great Location, Great Hotel!
thread.title_full: Great Location, Great Hotel! - Review of W New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: jaystatmusic
title: Great Location, Great Hotel!
text: Me and my wife stayed at the W for our anniversary. We really enjoyed our time at the hotel from the moment we walked in the door. The staff was very attentive and friendly and the room was very clean and modern. This hotel is a short walk or cab ride to Times Square, which made it very convenient. We will definitely be staying at the W on our next trip to NYC!
